class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n=len(nums)
        diff = [abs(nums[i]-nums[n-i-1]) for i in range(n//2)]
        diffx = [max(abs(k-min(nums[n-i-1],nums[i])), max(nums[n-i-1],nums[i])) for i in range(n//2)]
        # diff.sort()
        diffx.sort()
        c=Counter(diff)
        ans = n
        # print(diff,diffx)
        for p in range(k+1):
            idx = bisect.bisect_left(diffx, p)
            
            cans = idx+(len(diff)-c[p])
            # print(p,idx, cans)
            ans = min(ans,cans)
        return ans
